original_text: Against the walls of the main hall and inner sanctuary he built a structure around the building, in which there were side rooms.
korean_text: 또 성전의 벽 곧 성소와 지성소의 벽에 연접하여 돌아가며 다락들을 건축하되 다락마다 돌아가며 골방들을 만들었으니

sentences.original_text: Against the walls of the main hall and inner sanctuary
he built a structure around the building
in which there were side rooms
